sense.def:
To stride somewhere
pomeni iti nekam s hitrimi, dolgimi koraki.

seg.quote: Louisa watched him striding across the lawn.
He was striding out of the entrance.

sense.def:
A stride
je dolg premik noge, ki ga naredimo, ko hodimo ali tečemo.

A stride
je tudi hoja z dolgimi koraki.

seg.quote: She walked ahead with her purposeful stride.

sense.def:
To make strides in something that one is doing
pomeni hitro napredovati pri nečem, kar delamo.

cit.quote: narediti velike korake, doseči velik napredek

seg.quote: On the question of pay, giant strides have been made.

sense.def:
To take a difficult situation in one's stride
pomeni, da človek v zahtevnem položaju deluje mirno in ga brez težav razreši.

seg.quote: She takes examinations in her stride.
